short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension aims to help people with epilepsy by attempting to replace auto-playing gifs and videos with still images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unflash Me is meant to help people with epilepsy, migraines, and people who are sensitive to bright, rapid flashing.

Unflash Me aims to help people with epilepsy by attempting to stop all animations, replace gifs with still images, and stop videos from auto-playing.

When a page first loads, it will be blank, while the extension tries to stop animations, remove gifs, and stop videos. 

PLEASE READ: This is a work in progress, and may not always work as intended. Therefore, we are not liable if this extension does not help prevent seizures.
